original_text: And the people the men of Israel encouraged themselves, and set their battle again in array in the place where they put themselves in array the first day.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람들이 스스로 용기를 내어 첫날 전열을 갖추었던 곳에서 다시 전열을 갖추니라

sentences.original_text: And the people the men of Israel encouraged themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성 남자들은 스스로 용기를 내었고

sentences.original_text: and set their battle again in array
in the place where they put themselves in array the first day
